text: tatha unamen se kuchh vo hain, jo kaan dharate hain aapakee or yahaan tak ki jab nikalate hain aapake paas se, to kahate hain unase, jinhen gyaan diya gaya hai ki abhee kya[1] kaha hai? yahee vo hain ki muhar laga dee hai allaah ne unake dilon par aur vahee chal rahe hain apanee manokaankshaon par
